mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(yr_dt, '/', mon_dt, '/', dy_dt) AS kospiDate , val FROM kospi_index ORDER BY yr_dt ,mon_dt ,dy_dt

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT REPLACE(SUBSTR(ds,3,10),"-","/") AS kospiDate , SUBSTR(val,2,6) AS val FROM insight_kospi_index ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{days} ) A WHERE A.kospiDate > (SELECT CONCAT(yr_dt, '/', mon_dt, '/', dy_dt) AS kospiDate FROM kospi_index ORDER BY yr_dt DESC ,mon_dt DESC ,dy_dt DESC LIMIT 1) GROUP BY kospiDate ORDER BY kospiDate
